attributes.action: Make a requirement for all Shampoo/Shower Gel products to be Animal Cruelty Free
attributes.additional_details: Animals are kept in tiny living conditions, bred to be injected and poisoned with chemicals to provoke a reaction in their poor bodies. This often leads to the animal, which could range from a mouse to a dog, to experience excruciating pain and discomfort, sometimes even death. There are many better ways to test products, rather than on animals.
attributes.background: Make it a requirement for all Shower Gell/Shampoo products to be approved to be Animal Cruelty Free, meaning no animals have been used in the creation of the product or in testing stages.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638011

On 17 May, the Government said that it will not grant any new licences for animal testing of chemicals that are exclusively intended to be used as ingredients in cosmetics products: https://questions-statements.parliament.uk/written-statements/detail/2023-05-17/hcws779
